name: Self-Defender
description:
Pilot the advanced galactic starfighter: Self-Defender! Watch your fire, though - your power is amplified after every shot!

Shoot down enemy missiles and defend your cargo! It's as simple as that... or is it?!?

Made for GMTK's 2020 Jam using the theme "Out of Control".

Controls:

  • Move: Left & Right or A & D
  • Shoot: X or Spacebar
